oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Boscobel College for Young Ladies
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Boscobel College for Young Ladies, showing buildings and grounds.

Boscobel College for Young Ladies, originally founded as Nashville Baptist Female College by the Tennessee Baptist Convention in 1889, was located at Anna Shelby Williams' old east Nashville mansion. It closed after the East Nashville fire of 1916.
